Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2013 03:26AM michie56 wrote: I am TN...11.5 yrs later and I ended with mets to mediastinal, hilar node and lung. So yes it does happen and it sucks! Michele
Posts.Title: Recurrence of TNBC after 5 years lydiabest54 latoya81

Posts.Content: michie56 wrote: Does/has anyone gone into remission for years and not need chemo after being dx at stage 4? I just cant wrap my head around chemo forever. I'm having such a difficult time with this. First time, they told me to take a year out of my life and everything will be fine. I did that...I knew there was an end and a new beginning. There's no end to this nightmare. I'm sorry I can't be more upbeat...I'm just so sad to see everything in life taken from me.Â  Michele Dx 12/4/2001, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/2 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Dx 5/2013, IDC, Stage IV, Grade 3, mets, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
